welcome_message_body: Welcome to Veghel, Netherlands! This charming city is known for its beautiful canals, historical buildings, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Veghel has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Eindhoven Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private and charter flights at Kempen Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weeze Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Weeze Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
